video_prompt: Woman's body shifts slightly as she controls a futuristic console. Her expression subtly changes. Console displays flicker and glow. Background machinery hums with internal light fluctuations. Numeric indicators on the console update.
image_prompt: Anime digital illustration: Young blonde woman in futuristic black and white combat suit with orange and purple accents, seated in a high-tech metallic cockpit with orange glowing details. Clean, sharp lines, detailed mechanical elements, 3D shading. She faces right with a neutral expression. sci-fi, cyberpunk.
refined_video_prompt: A woman's body subtly shifts, her hands actively manipulating controls. Her facial expression evolves, reflecting a shift in focus. Console displays dynamically flicker and pulse with intricate light changes. In the background, machinery pulses with internal light fluctuations, its activity visibly shifting. Numeric indicators on the console rapidly update and scroll.
